pr_title: Remove remnants of LM from the Power codegen

timeline.message:
Remove remnants of LM from the Power codegen

Previously, a half-implemented feature called LM guarded storage was
present in the Power codegen. This code was never used since the
necessary hardware support was never added for it to work. Since it's
unlikely that the necessary support will ever be added, all associated
code has been removed.

Signed-off-by: Ben Thomas <ben@benthomas.ca>

timeline.bodyText: ebb is the general mechanism for user-level interrupt handling, used currently by both HWProfiling and LMGuardedStorage. I figured you cannot remove ebb.spp file from the build, unless you remove RI (RuntimeInstrumentation) too.
timeline.author: zl-wang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -58,7 +53,5 @@ j9jit_files(
 	p/runtime/Recomp.cpp
 	p/runtime/Recompilation.spp
 	p/runtime/PPCHWProfiler.cpp
-	p/runtime/PPCLMGuardedStorage.cpp
-	p/runtime/ebb.spp

replies.bodyText: Oops, looks like I accidentally removed an extra line here without noticing 😅. Should be fixed now.
replies.author: aviansie-ben
